about.summary: Pytest plugin for working with MPI

name: pytest-mpi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pytest-mpi" %}
{% set version = "0.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 316e834a942af8b95c436306f4d71796409eeb8487de75293b4c93aadf27c3eb

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - pytest
  run:
    - pytest

test:
  imports:
    - pytest_mpi

about:
  home: https://github.com/aragilar/pytest-mpi
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Pytest plugin for working with MPI'
  doc_url: https://pytest-mpi.readthedocs.io/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - beckermr
